Title: 079: Reinforcement Learning - What You Need to Know
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Associate Professor of Reinforcement Learning, Ravindran Balaraman. You will listen to an overview of Reinforcement Learning, learn about Prescriptive Analytics and some examples of Reinforcement Learning Applications, and you will also hear how to get started in Reinforcement Learning.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/79
